content: ashling shawl by veera välimäki ashling is a lovely and lightweight shawl to keep you both pretty and warm it has a little lace a lot of garter stitch and two sizes - just pick up the one you have enough yarn for 2 finished size materials yarn 1 2 skeins of merino lace by viola 100% merino 825 yards 754 meters per 115g approx 800 1400 yards 730 1280 meters of lace weight yarn the sample was knit in size large and in colorway mushroom needles us 4 3 5 mm circular needle 32 80 cm long or longer adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge other stitch markers tapestry needle and blocking aids sizing small large finished measurements 59 79 150 200 cm wingspan and 16 25 40 64 cm at deepest point gauge 22 stitches and 44 row = 4 10 cm in garter stitch after blocking pattern copyright © veera välimäki the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com 100-rain blogspot com 3 garter stitch body lace edging note you will now add the lace pat- using circular needle co 6 sts do tern to the shawl you will keep in- not join creasing on every 4th row as before setup row rs k2 m1l k2 m1r and at the same time add new repeats k2 of the lace pattern when you have setup row ws k2 m1l pm k1 increased all needed 11 stitches for pm k2 pm k1 pm m1r k2 a new repeat for each section you row 1 rs can use different colored markers k2 m1l knit to mark- for the lace repeats er sm m1l knit to marker sm m1l knit to marker m1r sm knit setup row rs k2 pm work row to marker m1r sm knit until 2 1 of chart a 4 5 times sm pm sts remain m1r k2 work row 1 of chart a 4 5 times chart a row 2-4 ws rs and ws sm pm work row 1 of 8 knit to 10 times pm sm work row 1 of end slipping markers chart a 4 5 times pm sm work row 1-4 repeat 41 52 times more chart a row 1 of 4 5 times pm you should have262 328 sts on note you have now two markers k2 needle work row 1 and 2 once more next to each other in the 4 center after that increase spots you should have 268 334 sts on setup row ws k2 sm work row 2 needle chart a of to marker sm sm work chart a row 2 of to marker sm pattern copyright © veera välimäki the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any
